name: Forgery!
description:
Forgery! is a chaotic, co-operative, campaign that follows four dwarven blacksmiths who must prove themselves as successful store-owners in the face of awkward customers, terrible working conditions and their own incompetence! 

Team up with up to three other Dwarves locally or online, don your beard and raise your hammers proudly!

A Co-Operative Multiplayer Dwarven Forge Adventure! 

  • Play co-operatively online or locally, with up to 4 players.

Forge and craft many types of weapons...and get rich! 

  • Forge iron and gold weapons! Swords, maces and axes…and more! Become legendary smiths of the Olde Kingdoms, and earn great riches!

Interact with different Customer NPCS! 

  • Sell your finely crafted weapons to a diverse cast of comedic Fantasy customers! From mischievous goblins and furious orcs, to the bumbling human peasants, there are many types of customers to please…or to just simply annoy

Hazards and dangers galore!

  • But watch out! Forgings a risky business…fires may spread, and accidents happen. Be prepared!
FORGE YOUR DESTINY!

Team Beardforge - we are a diverse and multi-skilled bunch of devs, who’ve been hard at work to bring you FORGERY!
